children.value: Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.
- a string representing the hash (32 bytes) of a block
- a hex of the integer representing the position in the block
- A transaction object, or null when no transaction was found
: the number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one.
: 32 Bytes - hash of the block where this transaction was in. null when its pending.
: block number where this transaction was in. null when its pending.
: integer of the transactions index position in the block. null when its pending.
: 20 Bytes - address of the receiver. null when its a contract creation transaction.
: gas price provided by the sender in Wei.
: the data send along with the transaction.
